name: Sorak
description:
The enemy ship appears in front of you.  It looks deadly. Firing volleys of missiles, balls of raw plasma, and spheres of energy from its arsenal.

Nevertheless, you fire back - with twin laser cannons of azure death blazing, you easily blast a big hole in the enemy's hull. The pilot realizes that he is no match for you and tries to escape. But no. You don't let him escape. You fire one last shot at him, and instantly, it explodes in a shower of flames. Oh yes! Welcome to hell....welcome to Sorak.

As a mercenary, flying the super advanced space fighter, you will be sent on interplanetary missions to destroy hordes of dangerous enemies.

Blast them all !
